workflow.description:
This workflow aims to generate a QRL for a consignment inventory transfer on the Transfer Order, Item Fulfillment and Purchase Order.
This workflow also generates a shipment confirmation email for a consignment inventory transfer via the Item Fulfillment and Purchase Order.
When an Item Fulfillment transitions into a Shipped Status, a shipment confirmation email can be sent to the Consignment Contact from the Consignment Manager and include a PDF copy of the Packing Slip shipment confirmation on the email.
When the "Marked Shipped" checkbox is checked on the Purchase Order (and if the Purchase Order is marked as Consignment Eligible), this workflow can send a shipment confirmation email to the Consignment Contact from the Consignment Manager and include a PDF copy of the PO shipment confirmation on the email.
workflow.name: CONS | Set QR Code and Send Ship Email

workflowstate.description: The workflow will remove any previously used QRL, QRL (LT) and Consignment Check-in URL if copied from an existing transaction.
workflowstate.name: Start Workflow

initcondition.formula: "Type" IN ("Transaction Type1") AND isChecked("Consignment Eligible") = 'T' AND isChecked("Mark Consignment PO Shipped") = 'T' AND "Status" IN ("Transaction Status1","Transaction Status2","Transaction Status3")
isEmpty("QRL") = 'F' AND isEmpty("QRL (LT)") = 'F' AND "Status" IN ("Transaction Status1","Transaction Status2","Transaction Status3","Transaction Status4")
isEmpty("Consignment Contact:E-mail") = 'F' AND isEmpty("Consignment Manager Email") = 'F' AND isEmpty("QRL") = 'F'
isEmpty("Consignment Customer:E-mail") = 'F' AND isEmpty("Consignment Manager Email") = 'F' AND isEmpty("QRL") = 'F' AND isEmpty("Consignment Contact Email") = 'T'

sendemailaction.body:
Hello {user.firstName},Â 

Your consignment email was not sent as either the Consignment Customer/Contact email or the Consignment Manager email is missing. Please check your records and resend the email.
sendemailaction.subject: Customer Consignment Email Not Sent: Item Fulfillment #{tranid}

initcondition.formula: ( isEmpty("Consignment Contact Email") = 'T' AND isEmpty("Consignment Customer:E-mail") = 'T' ) OR isEmpty("Consignment Manager Email") = 'T'
( isEmpty("Consignment Contact Email") = 'F' OR isEmpty("Consignment Customer:E-mail") = 'F' ) AND isEmpty("Consignment Manager Email") = 'F'

setfieldvalueaction.valuetext: The system was unable to send the email as either the Contact/Customer or Rep email is missing.

initcondition.formula: ( isEmpty("Consignment Contact Email") = 'T' AND isEmpty("Consignment Customer:E-mail") = 'T' ) OR isEmpty("Consignment Manager Email") = 'T'
